physical_appearance: This is a toran or a doorway hanging. It features a cotton weave with embroidery work. The toran is decorated with stylized depictions of four peacocks, various foliage, and a deity in the center. There are sewn-on inscriptions on two panels at the bottom of the hanging. The shape of the toran is irregular, with a rectangular top, and five dangling panels along the bottom.
subject_terms_1: embroidery (visual works) foliage (motif) birds (motifs) deities depictions (visual works) beadwork (visual works)
